img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(21\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Five_Skandhas_%2821%29.png)
You'll need to ascend quite high up, but where the path reaches a dead end, up above there's an opening in the cliff that you can pass through. Follow this until you enter an area that's slightly covered and pass through this tunnel.
img_below_text:
As you emerge in the wide open space, a Giant Shigandang will appear.
![Five Skandhas \(26\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/Five_Skandhas_%2826%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 17 from the file 'How_to_Find_the_Five_Skandhas_and_Unlock_a_Secret_Boss_.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Five Skandhas \(21\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Five_Skandhas_%2821%29.png)
You'll need to ascend quite high up, but where the path reaches a dead end, up above there's an opening in the cliff that you can pass through. Follow this until you enter an area that's slightly covered and pass through this tunnel."
            - Following Text: "As you emerge in the wide open space, a Giant Shigandang will appear.
![Five Skandhas \(26\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/Five_Skandhas_%2826%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts a dark, rocky tunnel with twisted tree branches framing the scene. Light pours in from an opening ahead, suggesting the end of the tunnel leads to a brighter, open area. The environment is eerie yet visually striking, setting the stage for progression in the narrative.

2. **Narrative Role**:  
The image represents the transition point described in the preceding text, where the player passes through a tunnel in the cliff. It visually prepares the player for the upcoming encounter in the wide open space mentioned in the following text, where a Giant Shigandang will appear.
